channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Give the gift of beauty whether it's a birthday, anniversary or just because! Join us for ideas and inspiration for truly pampering presents.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas One Time Deals
channel.desc: Don't miss out on our Christmas One Time Deals! Discover exclusive offers on festive must-haves to make your holiday season extra special. Grab these limited-time bargains while they last.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Big Deal Morning Show
channel.desc: Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elizabeth Grant
channel.desc: Step into the world of Elizabeth Grant, a beloved British beauty brand that offers superior skincare, working to give you complexion confidence at any age. Give your skin the gift of gorgeousness.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Peony Flowers
channel.desc: Enjoy the look of stunning blooms all year round with Peony Flowers' beautiful and inspirational faux flowers.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.title: In the Kitchen With Cuisinart
channel.desc: Discover a great range of food processors, blenders, coffee makers and more with Cuisinart's superb kitchen electricals.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.title: In the Kitchen With Cuisinart
channel.desc: Discover a great range of food processors, blenders, coffee makers and more with Cuisinart's superb kitchen electricals.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: SKINN Skincare
channel.desc: Everyone deserves access to skincare innovations, which is why the SKINN brand creates formulas with a scientific approach, to promote lifelong beauty and wellness.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Tova Collection
channel.desc: Inspired by the glamour of the classic Hollywood era, The Tova Collection features glamorous jewellery recreated from Tova's own personal collection, plus romantic fragrances for men and women.

channel.title: Get it or Regret it
channel.desc: Snap up the best offers at QVC before they're gone! We've got great savings on fashion, beauty, home and more, including items that won't be around for long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Better You
channel.desc: Looking for a boost? Better You offers innovative supplements that are easy to slot into your routine. Tune in and discover how Better You can help you thrive.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Garden Sales
channel.desc: Up to 50% Off Garden Sales.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with SBC
channel.desc: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Spectacular
channel.desc: Find the perfect sparkle with this dazzling collection of Diamonique simulated diamonds. You can enjoy all the glamour and style of diamonds without the price tag.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Prai Beauty
channel.desc: Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Looking for fab fashion pieces in petite sizes? Dannii Minogue has you covered, plus we've got a host of fantastic Sale offers for you to discover too! Tune in and get shopping.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tweak'd By Nature Haircare
channel.desc: Discover revolutionary haircare formulas from Tweak'd using luxurious ingredients from around the world, including kauri amber resin from New Zealand, dhatelo oil from Nepal, and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.
